text: Oyanagi Shigeta (小柳司気太, 1870 December 24 - 1940 July 18 ) is a Japanese scholar of Chinese literature and Taoism. He is from Niigata Prefecture and graduated from Tokyo Imperial University. His mom's last name is Kumakura (熊倉). ==References== Category:1940 deaths Category:1870 births Category:Japanese people
title: Oyanagi Shigeta
